page.title: 20 Acknowledgements
page.content: Class 2 of St.Giles C of E School have enjoyed the Domesday Project and have learned a great deal about life in their locality. We visited farms, footpaths and ponds and wish to thank all local landowners for their help and encouragement.Many others helped by answering questionnaires and being willing to be interviewed.Parents also need an acknowledgement for offering guidance,supervision and transport. Simon Scurr,Simon Nunn,Jason Jeggo, Christopher Marshall,Matthew Edwards, Daniel Funnell,Bryan Beckford, Angela Allin,Sarah Firmin,Rebecca Taber, Richard Golding,David Gay,James Patterson,Debbie Theobald,Rachel Brown Keely Morris,Samantha Bate,Anthony Tobin,Timothy Swales,Sadie De'Ath,Louise Golding,Emily Symington, Sophie Jeggo, Amanda Blunden and Catherine Scurr.
